Title: Data Analyst
Place: Pozuelo de Alarcón, Community of Madrid, Spain
Description:
Verisure is seeking a talented, innovative, passionate Data Analyst to join our growing and successful Group Marketing Team, reporting to the Group Head of Web development & Analytics.

Verisure is building a talented and passionate Digital Marketing Team, and the Data Analyst position is key to its success! This is your chance to visibly impact on Verisure’s growth and the development of a best-in-class organization.

The role’s relevance in data collection and analysis is a great opportunity for a strong talent to develop our organization’s growth. Our success depends on our people, and we invest in them every day. Working with Verisure is being part of an industry leading, world-class company that thrives on a strong entrepreneurial spirit.

Key Responsibilities

As a core member of the Group Digital Marketing team, the Data Analyst will play a crucial role in driving data-informed decision-making by performing the following responsibilities:

Improving the quality and consistency of digital marketing tracking, collaborating with technical teams to maintain a robust data infrastructure and ensure the integrity of analytics data.
Designing, building, and maintaining marketing performance dashboards and reports using Tableau, Looker Studio or similar data visualization tools, ensuring clarity, accuracy, and usability for diverse stakeholders.
Engaging with cross-functional stakeholders to understand business needs, translate them into data requirements, and deliver actionable insights through compelling analysis and visual storytelling.
Partnering with teams across the organization, including Product, CRM, and Web, to identify data opportunities, support campaign measurement, and foster a data-driven culture.
Extracting and manipulating data using SQL to support advanced analytics and reporting needs.
Contributing to the development and lifecycle of Adtech products, including participation in requirement definition, data architecture design, and ongoing maintenance.

Location

The position will be based in Madrid (Spain).

Candidate profile

Qualifications, Experiences, and Competencies

Required Qualifications

Education & Experience

Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, Economics, Marketing, or a related field.
Minimum of 2–3 years of experience in data analysis within a digital marketing or Adtech environment.
Experience working in multinational or cross-market teams is a plus.

Technical Skills

Good understanding of digital tracking technologies, including GA4, Google Tag Manager, and custom event tracking.
Solid experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or Looker Studio.
Familiarity with digital marketing platforms (e.g. Google Ads, Meta Ads, DV360, etc.).
Knowledge of marketing KPIs, attribution models, customer journey analysis, and performance measurement.
Proficiency in SQL for data extraction, cleaning, and manipulation across large datasets.
Ability to handle large datasets and navigate data warehouse environments (experience with BigQuery is a plus).
Basic understanding of Python or R for automation and exploratory data analysis is an advantage.

Analytical & Business Acumen

Strong ability to translate business problems into analytical questions and deliver actionable insights.
Working knowledge of conversion funnel analysis, CRO strategies, and campaign optimization.
Experience with A/B testing design, analysis, and interpretation is a plus.

Communication & Collaboration

Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present complex insights clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Proven ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams, including Product, CRM, Design, and Content.
Proactive, detail-oriented, and comfortable working autonomously in a fast-paced environment.

Languages

Fluent English is required (written and spoken).
Other languages (e.g. Spanish, French, German, or Nordic languages) are a plus.

Preferred Qualifications

Experience working with Google BigQuery or similar cloud-based data platforms.
Exposure to Adtech environments, CDPs (Customer Data Platforms), or server-side tracking.
Experience with automated reporting solutions or building data pipelines.
Familiarity with marketing mix modeling, predictive analytics, or machine learning use cases.
Certifications such as:
Google Analytics Certification
Tableau/Power BI certifications
Meta or Google Ads certifications

Strong fit with our Company DNA

Passionate in Everything We Do: Our people have a sense of energy that is unmistakable, one that drives us to delight our customers and focus on creating impact quickly. 

Committed to Making a Difference: When we say we will do something; we deliver with excellence. We are accountable, focused and operate with discipline. 

Always Innovating: We believe that Innovation can be big or small; it’s a continuous state of mind that inspires us to think differently and always make things better. We are risk takers and we learn continuously. 

Winning as a Team: Our people know that by leveraging one another’s strengths, investing in and developing our team’s capability and by collaborating well, we will win.

With Trust & Responsibility: Operating with integrity is core to our success. We are humble, honest and value deep mastery and expertise. We do the right thing, always.

The Company

Verisure is the leading European provider of professionally monitored security systems with 24/7 response services. We protect more than 5 million families and small businesses across 17 countries in Europe and Latin America. And our mission is to provide our customers peace of mind by protecting what matters most to them.

With over 35 years of insight, experience, and innovation, Verisure is known for category-creating marketing, sales excellence, innovative products and services, and customer-centricity. Thanks to a strong focus on high quality, our customers are amongst the most satisfied and loyal in our industry. We have some of the strongest double-digit growth and retention rates globally in consumer-facing services which demonstrates our exceptional service levels and strong value proposition to our customers.

Diversity, inclusion, equity, and belonging at Verisure

At Verisure, we are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace, recognising that diversity of thought and background only makes our teams stronger and more innovative. We reject all forms of discrimination and bias, and we believe in access to opportunities for everyone, regardless of gender, age, disability status, race, sexual orientation, or any other status. Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Belonging values are embedded in our company’s DNA. And we continue to prioritise our DEIB efforts every day to create a more inclusive organisation, enable diverse representation of our community, and ensure equity and meritocracy every step of the way.

Title: Junior Healthcare Data Analyst
HTML:
Learn About Knok

At knok, we dare to lead and humanize the digital transformation of healthcare. We envision a world where everyone has timely access to quality healthcare through digital technology, creating a more equal society. We genuinely believe in it and you can recognise it in every person who embraces this mission. We are rapidly growing, delivering augmented telemedicine on 4 continents, and we have barely begun!

About The Role

We are looking for a Junior Healthcare Data Analyst to support our teams in turning complex healthcare data into meaningful insights. You'll be working with datasets from different sources, such as clinical operations, insurance processing, and patient journeys - helping us improve care delivery and decision-making.

If you're passionate about using data to make healthcare more accessible and effective, don't stop here - dive deeper!

As an Junior Healthcare Data Analyst, you will:

  • Collect, clean, and analyse healthcare data from multiple sources (e.g. EHR, patient demographics, operational systems), to extract meaningful insights;
  • Develop and maintain dashboards, reports, and visualisations to communicate key metrics and findings to stakeholders, including clinicians, operational teams and leadership team;
  • Collaborate cross-functionally with teams across the organisation, including data science, product management, and clinical operations, to support data-driven decision-making;
  • Perform statistical analysis to support population health management, risk stratification, and clinical outcome optimisation;
  • Contribute to improving data quality by identifying data quality issues and anomalies, and work with relevant stakeholders to address and resolve them

What Makes You a Great Fit For This Journey

  • Bachelor's degree in Biomedical Engineering, Medical Statistics, Biomedical Sciences, Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Health Informatics, or a related field. Master's degree preferred;
  • Experience (academic or professional) with data visualisation tools such as Tableau, Power BI or similar;
  • Technical expertise regarding data models, database design development, data mining and segmentation techniques;
  • Ability to turn complex data into clear insights that support better decision-making;
  • Knowledge of programming languages such as Python or R for data analysis and statistical modeling;
  • Ability to explain a dashboard or an analysis to someone without a technical background, in a simple and practical way;
  • Care when working with data to ensure accuracy, consistency and reliability;
  • Ability to manage several analytical tasks at the same time, prioritising what has the greatest impact on the business and patients

Title: Data Analyst (mid level)
Description:
Dołącz do naszego zespołu i wesprzyj realizację kluczowego projektu dla sektora bankowego! Szukamy Analityka Danych, który będzie odpowiedzialny za dostarczanie rzetelnych danych do analiz ryzyka, tworzenie raportów oraz budowanie dashboardów monitorujących kluczowe wskaźniki.




Do Twoich obowiązków będzie należało:

Przygotowywanie i dostarczanie danych do analiz oraz obliczeń finansowych,
Tworzenie raportów i dashboardów wspierających procesy decyzyjne,
Wyszukiwanie i pobieranie danych z różnych źródeł,
Zapewnienie wysokiej jakości danych i ich zgodności z wymaganiami biznesowymi,
Współpraca z zespołem projektowym przy użyciu narzędzi takich jak JIRA.




Idealnie abyś posiadał/a:

Minimum 4-letnie doświadczenie w bankowości na stanowisku Analityka Danych,
Bardzo dobra znajomość SQL i praca z dużymi oraz złożonymi zbiorami danych,
Doświadczenie w pracy z Data Warehouse,
Doświadczenie w tworzeniu raportów i dashboardów (np. Power BI, Tableau lub inne),
Umiejętność samodzielnego wyszukiwania danych niezbędnych do analiz,
Znajomość narzędzi do zarządzania projektami (np. JIRA),
Wiedzę na temat danych i procesów bankowych (np. ocena ryzyka, analiza wyników finansowych),
Znajomość procesów ETL i budowy pipeline’ów danych,
Dostępność na pracę w modelu hybrydowym w Warszawie - warunek konieczny




Mile widziane:

Znajomość Pythona i/lub Sparka w kontekście analizy danych,
Doświadczenie w zapewnianiu jakości danych (data quality),
Podstawowa znajomość chmurowych platform danych (AWS, GCP, Azure).




Ze swej strony możemy zaoferować:

Pracę hybrydową w Warszawie
Benefity w całości opłacane przez CGI (przy UOP):
Opiekę zdrowotną - rozbudowany plan Medicover Maxima obejmujący opiekę stomatologiczną.
Kartę Medicover Sport.
Ubezpieczenie na życie, od wypadku i poważnego zachorowania.
Program Wsparcia Pracowników, który zapewnia Tobie i Twojej rodzinie bezpłatny i anonimowy dostęp do pomocy specjalistów, m.in. psychologa, terapeuty oraz prawnika.
Plan Zakupu Akcji CGI - jeśli zdecydujesz się na inwestycje w akcje ramach naszego programu, my dołożymy drugie tyle. Swobodnie i bez kosztowo możesz obsługiwać swój rachunek maklerski.
Sformalizowany program pracy twórczej - aż 90% swojego czasu możesz zaraportować jako pracę podlegającą autorskim kosztom uzyskania przychodu.
PPP (Profit Participation Plan) - roczną premię zależną od wypracowanych wyników Business Unitu.
Referral Program – otrzymasz ponad 6000 zł za każdą osobę zatrudnioną z Twojego polecenia.
Program Be Consultant, który daje możliwość rozwijania kompetencji, rotację przy projektach, a nawet zmianę ścieżki zawodowej w ramach firmy.
Mentoring Program, dzięki któremu możesz rozwijać swoje kompetencje poszerzać wiedzę, czerpiąc ją od swoich kolegów z CGI. Jeśli sam posiadasz duże doświadczenie, możesz się dzielić wiedzą z innymi!
Atrakcyjny program szkoleń - masz dostęp do szerokiego pakietu szkoleń: partnerskich szkoleń, profesjonalnych certyfikatów po szkolenia na platformie CGI Academia.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Data Analyst




Summary

Location: Barcelona (Hybrid) or Prague (Hybrid)

Day Rate: Negotiable

Duration: 6 Months

Availability: ASAP




About the Client

My client is the air transport industry's IT provider, delivering solutions for airlines, airports, aircraft, and governments. Their technology powers more seamless, safe, and sustainable air travel. They are looking to hire an experienced Data Analyst to join on a contract basis for a 4 month contract.




About the Role

We are seeking a detail-oriented and technically proficient Data Analyst to support the delivery and management of a centralized data archival system for financial and ERP platforms.

This is a techno-functional role that requires both hands-on technical skills and the ability to coordinate with cross-functional stakeholders to ensure successful implementation and ongoing management of the archival solution.

The successful candidate will play a key role in ensuring that legacy and historical financial data is securely archived, easily accessible when required, and fully compliant with data privacy standards and regulatory obligations.

Working closely with an external vendor, internal IT, and the Finance department, the candidate will help design, test, and optimize archival processes to ensure alignment with business needs.




Key Duties:

• Lead and manage the testing, validation, and implementation of a centralized data archival system for finance and ERP data.

• Collaborate with external vendors and internal stakeholders (Finance, IT, Compliance) to ensure accurate delivery and integration of the archival solution.

• Ensure all archived data meets internal compliance standards and external regulatory requirements for retention, security, and access.

• Oversee and validate data mapping, extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) activities related to financial data archiving.

• Develop and maintain documentation for archival processes, testing scripts, and compliance checks.

• Monitor vendor performance and ensure deliverables are met according to project timelines and SLAs.

• Identify and troubleshoot issues in data archival processes and recommend improvements where applicable.

• Support audit and compliance reporting by providing timely access to archived data.




What we are looking for Knowledge & Skills:

• Proven experience in data management, financial systems, or ERP platforms (such as SAP, Oracle, or Workday).

• Strong SQL skills for querying, validating, and managing data sets.

• Deep understanding of ERP data structures, particularly those related to finance and accounting modules.

• Advanced Excel capabilities for data analysis, reconciliation, and reporting.

• Experience with data privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR) and financial data retention policies.

• Demonstrated experience working with third-party vendors and cross-functional project teams.

• Excellent analytical thinking, problem-solving, and communication skills.

• Strong attention to detail with a methodical and organized approach to data.

Data Analyst


Summary

Location: Barcelona (Hybrid) or Prague (Hybrid)

Day Rate: Negotiable

Duration: 6 Months

Availability: ASAP


About the Client

Title: Business Intelligence Analyst
Description:
A TUA MISSÃO

Na Jerónimo Martins procuramos um Business Intelligence Analyst para integrar a nossa equipa do Recheio, com o objetivo de transformar o modelo de reporting e automação de processos




O QUE VAIS FAZER

Desenvolver dashboards e relatórios dinâmicos em QlikSense e Power BI.
Automatizar processos com Python e SQL para aumentar a eficiência.
Analisar dados financeiros e operacionais com pensamento crítico.
Identificar oportunidades de melhoria e propor soluções com impacto.
Colaborar com diferentes áreas para garantir consistência e integração dos dados.
Manter e evoluir soluções, assegurando a sua escalabilidade e fiabilidade.




O TEU PERFIL

2 a 3 anos de experiência em BI, reporting, automação ou análise de dados.
Capacidade analítica e crítica, com foco no negócio.
Experiência em QlikSense (mandatório) Power BI, Python e SQL.
Espírito colaborativo, autonomia e vontade de aprender num ambiente dinâmico.




QUEM SOMOS E O QUE PODES ESPERAR DE NÓS

Porque é que trabalhar connosco é diferente? Porque aqui, as pessoas estão no centro de tudo o que fazemos. Ao integrares a nossa equipa terás acesso a:

22 dias de férias + 2 dias*
Políticas de compensação competitivas
Oportunidades de formação e desenvolvimento
Ginásio, cabeleireiro e estética, cantina, clínica médica, nutrição e outras iniciativas de bem estar
Iniciativas de apoio familiar, saúde e educação e acesso a protocolos

* mediante cumprimento de critérios de absentismo.




Sabe mais acerca de como é trabalhar no Grupo Jerónimo Martins através do nosso website ou página de LinkedIn.

Title: Técnico de Análise de Dados e Projetos
HTML:
Country: Portugal

Estamos a recrutar um Técnico de Análise de Dados e Projetos, para a nossa Direção de Tecnologia & Operações.

Principais Responsabilidades:

  • Participar ativamente em projetos de desenvolvimento na área de operações, com o contributo analítico e funcional;
  • Desenvolver soluções fora do âmbito de IT. Exº: power automate, power BI;
  • Controlar e monitorizar de SLA's;
  • Comunicar e acompanhar os casos de quebra dos SLA's para garantir a sua resolução e/ou identificação da causa raiz;
  • Efetuar a análise processos críticos de Risco Operacional (RO) através do levantamento do processo junto das áreas e identificação de controlos mitigadores de RO;
  • Garantir junto das áreas a implementação dos controlos de mitigação identificados, assegurando a sua implementação e consequente seguimento;
  • Participar em projetos de desenvolvimento na área, com o contributo analítico e funcional;
  • Definir e produzir reportes;
  • Aplicar e controlar processos de melhoria contínua, assim como assegurar e controlar os planos de ação.

Perfil:

  • Conhecimento das ferramentas Power BI e Power Automate;
  • Experiência com Jira;
  • Bons conhecimentos de MS Excel;
  • Experiência em metodologia Agile;
  • Valoriza-se experiência no setor automóvel;
  • Conhecimentos de Inglês e Espanhol (preferencial);
  • Boa capacidade analítica, de planeamento e de gestão de prioridades;
  • Bom relacionamento interpessoal e gosto pelo trabalho em equipa;
  • Capacidade conceptual e analítica;
  • Atitude proativa na gestão dos riscos inerentes às atividades no seu dia-a-dia.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
En BCNC Group, para nuestro cliente Vueling, estamos buscando un/a Data Analyst con mentalidad crítica y perfil proactivo. Tu misión va más allá de la técnica: serás un pilar clave para transformar datos en decisiones.




En este rol, te encargarás de:

Storytelling con Datos: Generar visualizaciones e interpretaciones efectivas (tableros, gráficos, mapeos) con Tableau o Power BI, dando sentido al análisis y contando una historia clara a las áreas de negocio.
Puente con el Negocio: Liderar, junto al Product Owner, la relación con equipos comerciales y de operaciones para entender sus procesos, retos y necesidades en profundidad.
Resolución Proactiva: Apoyar en la resolución de desafíos de reportería y análisis, impulsando las mejores prácticas en el uso y consumo de datos con una mirada crítica.




Requisitos imprescindibles:

Experiencia: 4 años de experiencia laboral reciente como Data Analyst, con uso avanzado de Tableau, Power BI o similares.
Mentalidad: Perfil proactivo y crítico. Buscamos a alguien que aporte valor resolviendo problemas, no solo entregando reportes.
Habilidades Blendas: Comodidad y experiencia reuniéndose directamente con equipos de negocio para traducir sus necesidades en soluciones de datos.
Presencialidad: Es imprescindible residir en Barcelona o alrededores y tener disponibilidad para el modelo híbrido (1 día presencial/semana).
Idiomas: Español e Inglés avanzado (deseable).




¿Qué ofrecemos?

Contrato indefinido con BCNC Group.
Oportunidad de trabajar en proyectos estratégicos dentro de un sector dinámico.
Entorno de trabajo innovador con tecnologías avanzadas.
Plan de desarrollo y formación continua.




¿Esta oportunidad encaja contigo?

¡Postula ahora mismo o comparte este anuncio con la persona que creas que podría ser perfecta para el equipo!

Title: Business Data Analyst
Description:
We’re looking for a Business Data Analyst to join our team in Madrid and help shape the future of contextual advertising as we continue to expand globally.

Who We Are

At Seedtag, we lead the way in contextual advertising with our machine learning-powered platform. Our technology provides superior brand safety, human-like content understanding, and advanced cookieless targeting, making ads more engaging and respectful. Founded by two ex-Googlers in 2014, we’ve grown to over 600 Seedtaggers across 18 countries, raising €250M to revolutionise digital advertising.




Your Challenge




You will get full ownership of our business data and will be expected to propose and conduct analyses that transform Seedtag’s data into significant business opportunities and KPI improvements.
You will analyse the performance of our current Contextual products and processes and proactively propose initiatives that seek to improve Seedtag’s commercial and operational results.
You will develop tools that automate internal processes, increasing the efficiency and efficacy of Seedtag teams.
You will help build tools that enable the democratisation of data inside the company and allow Seedtag teams to make informed, data-driven decisions.
Finally, you will build a solid knowledge of the adTech ecosystem and develop strong business acumen.




What You’ll Need to Succeed




You have a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, Economics, Mathematics, Computer Science or Engineering. Specific certifications/education in Data/ Business Intelligence are a plus.
You have 3-5 years of experience in a fast-paced environment, either start-up, corporate or consulting.
You have advanced skills in SQL for data extraction, transformation, and analysis.
You have experience with ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes and tools.
You have knowledge of database management systems (e.g., BigQuery, MySQL).
You have experience working with programming languages such as Python or R for data analysis and manipulation.
You have experience in data visualisation tools such as Tableau, Looker, Power BI, or similar, and you have knowledge of Excel/ Sheets.
You have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights that drive business value.
You have the ability to collaborate with business stakeholders to identify information needs and define business requirements.
You have excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex data concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

It would be a big plus if you

Have experience in forecasting, trend analysis, and predictive modelling.
Have previous experience in presenting and communicating data analysis results and insights to external stakeholders.
Have experience working with Tableau.




Why Join Seedtag?




Growth & Opportunity: A key moment to join with vast career development prospects.

Flexibility: At Seedtag, we trust you to balance work and life effortlessly with the option to work from home, the office, or even the beach in our hybrid mode.

Learning & Development: Online courses in ODILO, and optional English or Spanish group classes.

Inclusive Culture: We foster a supportive environment that values personal growth.

Fun & Connection: Participate in team activities, company offsites, and more!




Additional Perks




Flexible benefits plan: Restaurant, transportation, and kindergarten vouchers.
Health insurance: Comprehensive coverage included.
Gympass: Access to wellness programs and fitness classes.
Seedsave Program: Exclusive discounts to help you save for the future.




Ready to join the Seedtag adventure?




Send us your CV and let’s grow together!

At Seedtag, we’re committed to creating an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive. We welcome diverse perspectives as they fuel our innovation and growth. Please let us know if you require accommodations during the hiring process and we’ll ensure a positive and accessible experience.

Title: Analista de datos BI
Place: Pozuelo de Alarcón, Community of Madrid, Spain
Description:
¡Dale un aire nuevo a tu vida y sigue creciendo en tu carrera dentro de SECURITAS DIRECT!

¿Quiénes somos?
Somos líderes en el mercado europeo de la protección y seguridad de personas para hogares y pequeños negocios, aportando un servicio excepcional a más de 3 millones de clientes/as con un equipo de más de 25.000 empleados, presentes en 17 países de Europa y América Latina. En Securitas Direct hemos creado las innovaciones más disruptivas del mercado, las cuales se han convertido en estándar para la industria y el sector. Combinamos la pasión, el compromiso, el compañerismo y la responsabilidad en nuestro día a día teniendo como foco principal el cuidado de nuestros clientes.

El departamento de Subdirección general de captación

Desde la subdirección general de captación, estamos buscando al mejor talento para incorporarse en nuestros equipos de negocio. En esta departamento trabajan 3 equipos con más de 20 profesionales liderando proyectos que impulsen la estrategia comercial de la empresa y la toma de decisiones a través del análisis de datos.

¿Quieres ser parte de nuestro crecimiento?

Reportando directamente al Head of del área de Business Intelligence dentro tu misión como Analista de Datos BI será el ayudar al cliente interno a la mejora de toma de decisiones  ayudando a identificar el problema de negocio y desarrollando la solución más adecuada, a través de la analitica del dato.

Responsabilidades en tu día a día

Automatización de Informes mediante la creación de Dashboards.

Estudios ad-hoc sobre el DWH Coorporativo para la ayuda de seguimientos de proyectos:

Análisis & Creación de KPIs de Negocio.

Prospección y análisis de nuevas variables.

Creación de Dashboards de seguimiento.

Entendimiento de procesos de Negocio, para una posterior creación de la lógica mediante procedimientos en SQL y así la obtención de los KPis de seguimiento.

Automatismos de Procesos de BI vía procesos en Python.

Requisitos de la posición

Titulación universitaria superior: Ingeniería Informática, Matemáticas, Estadística o similar. 

Experiencia mínima de 3 años como consultor en proyectos de BI y Reporting, o en funciones similares que capaciten al candidato/a en el desarrollo de las funciones indicadas.

Dominio leguaje SQL y experiencia con BBDD (Snowflake, Sybase, SQL Server,…).

Experiencia con herramientas de Reporting sobre todo Power BI. Valorable Business Objects.

Conocimientos de herramientas Open Source (Python, R,…) .

Valorable Conocimientos de Hyperion.

Clara Orientación al Cliente.

Persona proactiva, analítica y con buena capacidad de comunicación.

Requisitos valorables:

Creación de Modelos Estadisticos de Optimización o de Segmentación.

Conocimiento en otras herramientas de reporting similares (Microstrategy, Qlik, Tableau,... ).

Conocimientos en herramientas de ETL.

Conocimientos de Gestión de Proyectos con IT.

¿Qué te ofrecemos?

Modelo híbrido de teletrabajo (16 días de teletrabajo al trimestre) para que los adaptes a tus necesidades.

Horario flexible de entrada/salida y jornada intensiva los viernes.

22 días de vacaciones al año + 1 día de asuntos propios + bolsa de horas de exceso.

La tarde de tu cumpleaños ¡Libre!

Plan de carrera personalizado anual.

Comedor subvencionado, contamos con 3 restaurantes dentro de nuestra oficina por lo que ¡Olvídate de Tuppers!

Descuentos en productos propios.

Retribución flexible.

Apoyo a la maternidad, paternidad, políticas de igualdad y diversidad.

¿Y que hay acerca de la formación?
Serás el/la protagonista de tu ruta de aprendizaje, por lo que contarás con miles de recursos para seguir impulsando tu conocimiento técnico.

Más de 100h en formación en idiomas.

¡Tú eres protagonista de tu desarrollo! Tendrás la oportunidad de desarrollar un catálogo formativo adhoc adaptado a tu perfil profesional.

¿Y ahora qué?
Si has llegado hasta aquí es porque realmente te hemos parecido interesantes. Cómo próximos pasos, apúntate en nuestra oferta y el equipo de gestión de personas revisará tu perfil. Si encajas con la necesidad, te llamaremos para poder conocerte y darte más información acerca de la posición y de nosotros.

Como último consejo: ¡Se tú mismo/a!

¡Estamos deseando conocerte!

  • Modelo híbrido de teletrabajo (16 días de teletrabajo al trimestre) para que los adaptes a tus necesidades.

  • Horario flexible de entrada/salida y jornada intensiva los viernes.

  • 22 días de vacaciones al año + 1 día de asuntos propios + bolsa de horas de exceso.

  • La tarde de tu cumpleaños ¡Libre!

  • Plan de carrera personalizado anual.

  • Comedor subvencionado, contamos con 3 restaurantes dentro de nuestra oficina por lo que ¡Olvídate de Tuppers!

  • Descuentos en productos propios.

  • Retribución flexible.

  • Apoyo a la maternidad, paternidad, políticas de igualdad y diversidad.

¿Y que hay acerca de la formación?
Serás el/la protagonista de tu ruta de aprendizaje, por lo que contarás con miles de recursos para seguir impulsando tu conocimiento técnico.

  • Más de 100h en formación en idiomas.

  • ¡Tú eres protagonista de tu desarrollo! Tendrás la oportunidad de desarrollar un catálogo formativo adhoc adaptado a tu perfil profesional.

¿Y ahora qué?
Si has llegado hasta aquí es porque realmente te hemos parecido interesantes. Cómo próximos pasos, apúntate en nuestra oferta y el equipo de gestión de personas revisará tu perfil. Si encajas con la necesidad, te llamaremos para poder conocerte y darte más información acerca de la posición y de nosotros.

Como último consejo: ¡Se tú mismo/a!

¡Estamos deseando conocerte!

Title: Data Analyst (H/F)
Description:
Vous souhaitez rejoindre une entreprise qui place l’humain au cœur de ses préoccupations ? On vous attend chez Extia !

Société de conseil spécialisée dans les métiers de l’IT et du digital, Extia privilégie depuis sa création en 2007 une approche qui allie performance et bien-être au travail. Une vision de l’entreprise partagée aujourd’hui par plus de 2 500 Extiens en France et à l'international et récompensée par le label Great Place to Work® depuis 13 ans !

Nous croyons en l'égalité des chances et nous offrons à chaque candidat la possibilité de révéler son potentiel, sans distinction et de quelque nature qu'elle soit. Chez Extia, c’est « D’abord qui, ensuite quoi » alors, allons-y !

D'abord qui


Bon(ne) communiquant(e), vous créez facilement du lien avec les nouvelles personnes que vous rencontrez,
Méthodique, les plans d’action sont dans votre ADN,
Ayant le goût du résultat, avec vous il n’y a pas de problème, il n’y a que des solutions.
Attiré(e) par le challenge, vous souhaitez gagner en compétences au sein d’une équipe originale, ambitieuse et très dynamique ?


Ensuite quoi

Description Du Poste

Vous serez intégré(e) dans une équipe de consultants innovants et motivés, composée de Business Analysts, Data Scientists et Data Engineers spécialisés sur les problématiques Data Analytics. À ce titre, vous interviendrez de façon opérationnelle sur des missions de conseil autour des sujets de transformation Data Analytics, de retraitement et modélisation de données et de représentation visuelle de la donnée pour adresser des problématiques métiers.

Vous serez notamment en charge de :


Comprendre les problématiques métier,
Collecter et traiter les données en vue de l'analyse, incluant notamment la création de variables agrégées et complémentaires aux données brutes,
Automatiser et d’industrialiser les retraitements effectués sur les données,
Représenter les résultats dans un outil de restitution visuelle de façon ergonomique et intuitive,
Restituer les analyses au client notamment pas la création d’indicateurs pertinents pour les questions stratégiques des entreprises


PROFIL RECHERCHE

Diplômé d'une école d'ingénieurs ou équivalent (Bac +5), vous justifiez d’a minima 2 ans d’expérience réussis en tant que data analyst :


Vous possédez une bonne connaissance des outils et méthodologies de Data Analytics, incluant notamment des bases techniques (modèles de données, langage SQL, …) mais également méthodologiques,
Vous possédez une connaissance approfondie d'Excel et maitrisez les langages statistiques tels que R, Python ou SAS,
Une connaissance d'un logiciel ou langage dédié à la Data Visualization (Tableau, Qliksense ou Qlickview, Microsoft Power BI…) ainsi que des compétences en automatisation (VBA par exemple) seraient un plus.


PROCESSUS DE RECRUTEMENT


Échangez avec un ou une chargée de recrutement pour un premier contact téléphonique
Rencontrez un ou une Ingénieure d’Affaires (Business Manager) sur vos souhaits d’évolution
Approfondissez avec nos responsables et directeurs d’agence pour connaître la vision de l'agence


Selon votre profil, des tests ou entretiens techniques pourront vous être demandés. Tout au long du processus, vous pourrez échanger avec nos consultants pour en savoir + sur leur quotidien chez nous !

PACKAGE SALARIAL

Chez Extia Belgique IT, la transparence fait partie intégrante de l'expérience positive, voici un aperçu des éléments de package salarial dont peuvent profiter nos collaborateurs, sous réserve d'éligibilité

👛 Voiture de société ou budget mobilité ✨ Chèques repas & Ecocheque 🎁 Assurance groupe 🎉 Frais de représentation 📈 Plan cafétéria / Flex Income Plan 🚀 Primes d'apport d'affaire, de cooptation et de formation 🌍 20 jours de congés légaux + 12 jours de récupération

Ces informations sont communiquées à titre indicatif et seront abordées plus en détails lors du processus de recrutement.

LES PETITS PLUS

🎉 250 événements par an pour rencontrer tes collègues et des locaux feel good 📢 Des formations, conférences et une plateforme d'e-learning avec LinkedIn pour monter en compétences #greatplacetolearn 👩‍ Des Communautés Métiers et du Mentorat pour partager son expertise et en apprendre sur de nombreux sujets #greatplacetoshare 🕹️ Une communauté de e-sport : Extia Gaming ! #greatplacetoplay 🌏 Envie d’évoluer ? Grâce à notre politique de mobilité interne, explorez de nouvelles opportunités en Belgique ou dans l’un de nos 7 autres pays !
Show more

Title: Business Data Analyst
Description:
Company Description

With over 5,000 employees based in more than 80 countries across the globe, our teams provide industry leading expertise that spans:


Consumer Engagement
Parts, Accessories & Service Performance
Actionable Insights
Diagnostics & Repair Enhancement
Warranty and Repair Efficiency
Technical Information
Learning Solutions
Sales Performance


Building trust since 1931, our proven track record means that we now partner with almost every car manufacturer on the market.

The MSXI Purpose

To empower Movers and Makers to thrive in our ever-changing world

The MSXI Mission

To harness our expertise in mobility, the creativity of our global teams,

and the power of technology, to craft tailored and innovative solutions

The MSXI Vision

To enhance every journey in the world of mobility

Job Description

Business Data Analyst

40 hours per week, Monday-Friday

Rome, hybrid

Are you an automotive fan and have a passion for data analysis? Do you enjoy collecting and analyzing data to detect improvements? MSXI has the job for you!

MSX is looking for a proactive and enthusiastic Business Data Analyst to join our team in Rome.

The Role

Responsibilities

As part of our team, you will support the data management and analysis processes as well as the development and deployment of our Data and AI literacy program. Your primary responsibilities will include collecting, organizing, and interpreting data to help guide decision-making processes. Your key tasks will be:


Develop and maintain dashboards, reports, and visualizations that provide insights into Lean program performance and business operations
Provide data-driven recommendations to stakeholder
Document processes, findings, and recommendations clearly and effectively for both technical and non-technical audiences


Qualifications

About you

About

We would love to welcome a new colleague passionate about the automotive field, oriented to teamwork and taking the good dose of initiative to achieve results. Our ideal Business Data Analyst has a Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical field, as well as:


3+ years experience as a Business Analyst, with background in data analytics and AI
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Entry level knowledge of SQL, ETL processes, and data modeling
Experience with BI tools and data visualization platforms such as Power BI, Tableau, or similar
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a dynamic and fast-paced environment
Experience of planning complex schedules of activities
Fluent level of English


If you’re ready to make an impact and contribute to our company’s success, apply now!

What’s in it for you?

At MSX, our employees are the force behind our success. We are dedicated to empowering and encouraging our people and offer flexible working methods to suit all. We are a Disability Confident Committed organisation who takes pride in our diverse workforce.

In Joining MSX, You Can Enjoy


Competitive salary
Company laptop and phone
Lunch voucher


Working Pattern


40 hours per week
Monday – Friday
Rome - hybrid


You can learn more about MSX International on our website: www.msxi.com

Additional Information

MSX is an equal opportunities employer and positively encourages applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of sex, race, disability, age, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, religion or belief, marital status, or pregnancy or maternity. As users of the disability confident scheme, we guarantee to interview all disabled applicants who meet the minimum criteria for the vacancy.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
¡Hola Data Lover! 💙




¿Estás en último curso o acabas de finalizar tus estudios en Ingeniería Informática, Telecomunicaciones, Ciencia de datos, Industriales u otra salida académica similar?




¿Quieres llevar tus habilidades en Data, Analytics & IA al siguiente nivel? 🚀.




Somos líderes globales, trabajamos con la mitad del IBEX-35 y no paramos de crecer desde 1994.

Si te apasionan los datos, ¡únete a nosotrxs! ✨📊




¿Cuál será tu misión?




Te involucrarás desde el principio en proyectos reales de Data, realizando tanto el análisis técnico, la transformación de datos y el desarrollo de cuadros de mando para los departamentos de negocio de nuestros clientes.







¿Cómo podrás hacerlo?




Aprendiendo todo lo posible a nivel técnico y, poco a poco, te haremos ganar confianza en ti mismo e irás contando con la capacidad de gestionar tu propio tiempo y cada vez trabajar con mayor autonomía.
Te encargarás también de la redacción de la documentación del proyecto en el que participes.
Participarás en el análisis funcional de los proyectos, lo que te permitirá entender el negocio y tener una visión global y mayor conocimiento de los clientes.
Irás ganando mayor conocimiento y responsabilidad lo que te permitirá participar en más fases de los distintos proyectos. Participarás en el diseño y desarrollo de cuadros de mando desde cero al igual que en el diseño y desarrollo de procesos de modelado de dato y transformación de datos con tecnologías y herramientas específicas de ETL on-premise y cloud.
Te encargarás de la formación a usuarios de negocio con el fin de que el cliente sepa interpretar los datos de la mejor manera posible. Por ello, tendrás un mayor posicionamiento de cara al cliente con constante interlocución y dando soluciones a sus necesidades.
Te mantendrás actualizado en las últimas tendencias tecnológicas en el ámbito de Data & Analytics para poder ofrecer las mejores soluciones a nuestros clientes.







🚀 ¿Qué nos hace únicxs?




Aquí no somos una empresa más... ¡somos un equipo que va a por todas! 💡✨




🔹 La tecnología y los datos son nuestra esencia. No solo trabajamos con lo último del mercado, sino que te formaremos para que domines las herramientas más innovadoras. Contamos con un área de innovación donde exploramos nuevas alianzas con gigantes tecnológicos y centros de I+D.




🔹 Tú marcas el ritmo. Olvídate de estructuras rígidas. Cada semestre, te sentarás con tu responsable para hablar de tus logros, nuevos retos y… ¡ajustes salariales en base a resultados!




🔹 Desde el minuto 1, serás parte de nuestra familia. Aquí nadie camina solx. Siempre habrá un compañerx dispuesto a ayudarte. 🤝😃




🔹 Aprenderás de lxs mejores. Te codearás con cracks del sector (tanto técnicos como de negocio), que estarán encantadxs de compartir su conocimiento y celebrar tu crecimiento. 📈🔥




🔹 Somos una empresa con propósito. Creemos en la diversidad y la inclusión como motores de la creatividad, lo que nos permite superar cualquier desafío. 🌍💜




📌 Y, por si fuera poco…




✅ Contrato indefinido (¡queremos que te quedes mucho tiempo!)

✅ Jornada intensiva en julio y agosto 🏖️

✅ Salario competitivo según tu formación y experiencia

✅ Apoyo económico para el teletrabajo 💻🏡







Si buscas un lugar donde crecer, innovar y sentirte parte de algo grande… ¡este es tu sitio! 🚀💥

Show more

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Job Title: Data Analyst - temporary assignment

Location: Utrecht (Hybrid)







About the Role:




For Protiviti, we are looking for a skill Data Analyst to establish a single source of truth and integrate it into DBT (Data Build Tool). This role require a strong mix of data, business, and technical expertise to support data modeling, transformation, governance, and collaboration across teams.




Key Responsibilities:




Develop and implement data models using DBT (models, tests, seeds, snapshots, macros).
Ensure data normalization and denormalization processes align with business needs.
Define and manage KPIs and product analytics metrics.
Align data models with business use cases and design a measurement plan.
Work with product analytics tools and cloud platforms (Google Cloud preferred).
Validate and test data in DBT (dbt test) to ensure accuracy and reliability.
Define data contracts, SLAs, and implement version control (Git) and documentation (Colibra).
Collaborate with engineering teams to align data sources and improve data pipeline efficiency.
Engage with business stakeholders to ensure data models serve strategic objectives.
Provide clear documentation and definitions for KPIs and data models.




Required Skills & Experience:




Strong proficiency in SQL and data modeling techniques.
Hands-on experience with DBT and its core components.
Understanding of product analytics and relevant KPIs.
Experience with cloud platforms, ideally Google Cloud.
Data governance knowledge, including validation, testing, and documentation best practices.
Familiarity with Git for version control and Colibra for documentation.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work in a hybrid environment and engage with multiple stakeholders.
Immediately available for a temporary assignment
Able to work onsite in Utrecht




Why Join Us?




Opportunity to shape the data landscape within a dynamic environment.
Work on impactful projects that drive business decision-making.
Collaborative and innovative team culture.
Competitive salary and benefits package.

Show more

  • Collaborative and innovative team culture.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.

Title: Data Analyst H/F
Description:
Au sein de l’équipe Products Systems Engineering, rattaché à l’agence de Vitrolles vous occuperez le rôle Data Analyst H/F.

Dans le cadre de l'analyse des données, vous êtes en charge de l'automatisation des processus pour fournir des solutions efficaces et des visualisations claires.

Missions


Identifier les données pertinentes, définir le problème avec les instruments métiers, et proposer des solutions adaptées.
Implémenter des scripts pour extraire, transformer, charger (ETL), et fusionner des données complexes.
Structurer le code, créer des bases de données et schémas (ex. diagrammes UML), et garantir une solution durable.
Réaliser des analyses quantitatives et qualitatives, proposer des dashboards interactifs, et synthétiser les résultats.
Identifier des pistes d’amélioration, formuler des propositions, et travailler sur le développement d’outils avec les équipes informatiques.


Profil


De formation BAC+5 en data science, mathématique.
Vous avez une expérience significative de 5 années dans un poste similaire.
Vous disposez d’un niveau opérationnel en anglais.
Vous faites preuves d’un esprit d’analyse, de rigueur et d’une aisance relationnelle.
La maitrise des bases de données SQL et NoSQL / des langages : Data Science : Python, R, SQL, etc
La maitrise des outils de BI : Spotfire, Power BI, Tableau, etc / des environnements cloud GCP, Azure ou Aws


Rémunération Et Avantages


Politique interne sur le télétravail
CSE (chèque vacances, culture, subvention pratique sportive, etc).
13 RTT + un compte épargne temps
Carte de tickets restaurant
Prévoyance Santé
Prime de vacances
Prime de cooptation
Contribution au remboursement de vos titres de transport en commun ou forfait à la mobilité durable
Salaire à partir de 40 000€ brut annuel suivant votre expertise


Notre Process De Recrutement


Vous candidatez,
Premier échange téléphonique avec notre équipe recrutement,
Un entretien avec votre futur manager et votre chargé de recrutement en agence ou en visio
Si validation, envoi de la proposition de collaboration
Début de votre parcours d’intégration chez Expleo !


A bientôt dans nos équipes !

La localisation des postes n’est qu’indicative, une mobilité géographique sur le territoire national peut être requise.

A compétences égales, une attention particulière sera accordée aux candidatures des travailleurs handicapés et autres bénéficiaires de l'obligation d'emploi de l'article L. 5212-2 du code du travail. »

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Company Overview:

Mitrade is an award-winning global Contract for Difference (CFD) and forex broker, regulated by authorities in Australia (ASIC), Cyprus (CySEC), the Cayman Islands (CIMA), and Mauritius (FSC). We were founded in Melbourne, Australia and have offices worldwide.




Leveraging our proprietary in-house state-of-the-art technology, Mitrade has developed a one-stop digital trading platform tailored for traders. We offer market data, news, and analysis, as well as trading and risk management services within a comprehensive user-centric Fintech ecosystem. Serving more than five million users globally, Mitrade is accessible via various platforms such as mobile (iOS and Android), desktop applications, and web browsers.




Our Cyprus office, Mitrade EU, is in a growth phase, presenting a unique opportunity to join the founding team and work actively within the core of the business. With this, internal growth is not only welcomed but also encouraged, providing our employees with the opportunity to grow, develop and succeed in their current role and any future roles they might have with Mitrade Group. This position offers not only career development opportunities but also the chance to be part of a fun, dynamic team that collaborates to support our clients.




Role Summary:

We are seeking an experienced Data Analyst to join our team in Limassol. The successful candidate will be a highly business-oriented and technically proficient Data Analyst who will make a tangible impact on business growth, playing a key role in developing the infrastructure and analytics that drive regulatory compliance and empower smarter business decisions.




In this role, you will work closely with key stakeholders across multidisciplinary teams and locations to deliver solutions and turn complex datasets into actionable insights.




What Would Be Your Responsibilities:

Develop and maintain automated business intelligence reports and dashboards for management, compliance, and regulatory reporting
Prepare regular and ad-hoc reports for management, compliance team, regulatory submissions and audits
Conduct data quality assessment to ensure data accuracy and integrity, implement data governance best practices
Collaborate with trading, marketing, and product teams to support pricing strategy analysis and spread optimization initiatives, and to optimize all-over business strategies
Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) including client acquisition, retention, lifetime value, and trading volumes
Create comprehensive analysis of client trading patterns, risk metrics, and profitability analysis
Perform client segmentation analysis to support targeted marketing campaigns and product development
Work with IT teams to optimize database performance and data architecture




What We Require from You:

2+ years of hands-on experience as a Data Analyst, BI Developer or similar role in financial services, preferably in a CySEC or similar EU-regulated CFD/Forex brokers or investment firms
Strong understanding of CFD products, financial markets, and trading mechanics
Education background in Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering, Computer Science or related quantitative field is preferred
Advanced proficiency in SQL for complex data querying and database management
Expert-level skills in data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, or similar)
Experience with data warehousing concepts and ETL processes
Project management capabilities, including requirements gathering and solution implementation.
A proactive mindset with strong analytical and problem-solving abilities with attention to detail
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
Collaborative team player with ability to work across departments




Below Advanced Analytics Skills are considered as a plus:

Experience with statistical analysis and hypothesis testing.
Knowledge of machine learning concepts and applications for client segmentation, anomaly detection, and predictive forecasting.
Proficiency in at least one programming language (Python, R) for data manipulation and analysis.
Experience in conducting competitive research and analysing benchmarking data.
Knowledge of data protection regulations relevant to financial services.
Experience in establishing data standards and governance policies.
Familiarity with Agile development methodology and DataOps principles and best practices.




What You Can Look Forward To:

Be part of a dynamic and multi-cultural team
Career growth opportunities with global offices
Competitive salary
Performance-based bonus
Private medical insurance
Education subsidy & full-paid Study Leave
Fitness membership allowance
21 days of annual leave increasing every year
Birthday Leave
Sick Leaves
Work from Home Policy
Weekly Lunch

  • 21 days of annual leave increasing every year
  • Birthday Leave
  • Sick Leaves

Title: Business & Data Analyst
Description:
Position Overview:

As a Business and Data Analyst, you will play a crucial role in transforming data into actionable insights that drive business strategy and performance. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities, analyse trends, and contribute to our growth and success.




Your responsibilities:

− Prepare reports, analyses, and presentations (cyclical and current) regarding market sales trends.

− Analyse financial data and market trends to support strategic decision-making.

− Conduct comprehensive market analyses to identify opportunities, risks, and emerging trends that may impact sales performance.

− Create business development recommendations based on the analyses conducted.

− Provide information on the degree of achievement of sales goals within the sales network.

− Analyse the current contract portfolio in terms of applications, retention, and earned margin.

− Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to track key performance indicators.

− Build, document, implement, and monitor predictive and segmentation models that optimize decision-making processes in the company.

− Acquire and prepare data for analysis and modelling (data extraction from databases, cleaning, transformation, etc.).

− Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and deliver analytical solutions.

− Use prepared reports for presentations for the company's internal needs.

− Propose and implement reporting automation/improvement solutions.

− Maintain the data repository and expand it with new data sources.




What we require:

− University education, with at least a Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Business Administration, Data Science, or a related field.

− A minimum of 2 years of proven experience in a similar position.

− At least one year of professional experience in building predictive and segmentation models and statistical data analysis.

− Proficiency in English and Slovak.

− Highly developed analytical skills.

− Practical knowledge of databases.

− Very good knowledge of MS SQL. Proficiency in data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).

− Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

− Experience in the finance/leasing industry is preferred.

− Ability to prepare PowerPoint presentations.

− Excellent communication and presentation abilities.

− Independence, reliability, responsibility, flexibility, loyalty, precision, and a willingness to learn.




What We Offer:

− Basic monthly salary from €2,000 brutto (final salary may vary depending on the candidate's level of qualification and relevant work experience).

− Backing of a strong, stable financial group – one of the largest captive networks in the world.

− Annual discretionary bonus, attractive benefits package (an extra week of vacation, 4 sick days per year, contributions on childbirth and wedding, Ticket Compliment vouchers, discounted products and services, free drinking regime, Multisport card, contribution to pension funds (DDS), private medical care, English language learning, regular employee events, financial reward for referring a new colleague, and more).

− Work in beautiful new offices with parking facilities.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
CLEEVEN est un cabinet de conseil européen fondé autour de deux convictions fondamentales :

L’excellence des ingénieurs européens doit être un moteur de la compétitivité mondiale
Notre mission humaine : accompagner nos consultants dans leur développement personnel et professionnel




Dans le cadre d’un programme de transformation digitale dans le secteur industriel et pharmaceutique, nous recrutons un Data Analyst pour accompagner notre client dans ses besoins en reporting et en visualisation de données. Le rôle consiste à concevoir des tableaux de bord, assurer la qualité des données et fournir des analyses actionnables aux parties prenantes métiers.




Rôle et responsabilités:

Concevoir et développer des rapports et tableaux de bord avec Power BI, Tableau et Grafana
Recueillir les besoins métiers et les traduire en solutions data-driven
Réaliser des analyses de données pour identifier tendances, anomalies et leviers d’optimisation
Collaborer avec les data engineers et équipes IT pour garantir la cohérence et la disponibilité des données
Documenter les métriques, KPIs et processus de reporting dans une logique de gouvernance et de conformité
Accompagner les utilisateurs finaux (formation, bonnes pratiques en self-service analytics)
Garantir que les solutions de visualisation répondent aux objectifs métiers et aux standards de conformité




Compétences clés:

Minimum 3 ans d’expérience professionnelle en tant que Data Analyst ou Consultant BI
Maîtrise des outils de reporting : Power BI, Tableau, Grafana (la connaissance d’autres outils est un plus)
Solides compétences SQL pour l’interrogation et la manipulation de bases relationnelles
Bonne connaissance du data modeling, des KPIs et des principes de gouvernance des données
Une expérience en environnement industriel ou réglementé (pharma, finance, industrie) est un plus
Esprit analytique et fortes capacités de résolution de problèmes




Profil recherché:

Diplôme en Data Science, Informatique ou équivalent (Bac+5 de préférence)
Minimum 3 ans d’expérience en reporting, data visualisation ou analyse de données
Anglais professionnel requis ; l’allemand est un gros atout
Excellentes capacités de communication avec les équipes techniques comme avec les métiers
Personnalité structurée, rigoureuse et proactive
Disponibilité pour travailler sur site en Suisse (région de Bâle)




À très vite !

Title: Junior Data Analyst - Commercial
Description:
Chceš, aby tvoje práce měla dopad? Máš rád/a čísla, ale nechceš být jen „ten člověk s Excel tabulkou“? Přidej se k nám a pojď s námi hledat způsoby, jak dělat věci chytřeji – pomocí dat, spolupráce a inovací.




O čem tahle role je?




Budeš pracovat v týmu Commercial, který pomáhá firmě růst chytře – ne jen „víc prodávat“, ale hlavně investovat tam, kde to fakt dává smysl.
Budeš analyzovat, co funguje (a co ne), hledat cesty, jak dělat pricing a promoční aktivity efektivněji, a srozumitelně vysvětlovat svoje závěry a doporučení kolegům z obchodu a marketingu.
Část práce bude pravidelná (weekly/monthly/quarterly reporty, přehledy), část hodně různorodá (ad-hoc analýzy, práce na projektech zlepšování procesů, implementace nových nástrojů etc).
Práce s Excelem a Power BI.




Koho hledáme?




Zájem o data a analytické myšlení – hledáme někoho, koho baví objevovat, co se skrývá za čísly.
Excel na pokročilé úrovni (min. pivotky, pokročilé funkce, ideálně i makra).
Zkušenost s Power BI či obdobným nástrojem je super (ale když nemáš, naučíme tě).
Chuť mluvit s lidmi – často budeš zjišťovat, co kolegové potřebují, a pomáhat jim dělat lepší rozhodnutí.
Angličtinu na úrovni, kdy zvládneš napsat e-mail nebo odprezentovat jednoduchý výstup i expatům (min B2).
A hlavně: otevřený mindset, odvahu zkoušet nové věci a chuť posouvat věci dopředu.




Proč pracovat právě s námi?

Práce, která má smysl – uvidíš dopad toho, co děláš, a pomůžeš firmě chytře růst.
Možnost růst spolu s námi – naučíš se toho fakt hodně o prodejních procesech, zákaznících i strategii.
Fajn tým, kde se nebojíme ptát, sdílet nápady a zkoušet nové věci. Role reportuje RGM manažerovi a komunikuje i s top managementem.
Flexibilní prostředí, kde můžeš přicházet s vlastními zlepšováky.
Značky, které mají jméno, a firemní kultura, která vám dá prostor zazářit.
Osobní i profesní rozvoj – talentové programy, školení a rozvojové aktivity. + e-learning platforma
Široká škála benefitů:
5 týdnů dovolené + 2 flexi days
Fasování: produkty zdarma (3 balení měsíčně) + zvýhodněný nákup firemních produktů a merche
Flexibilní benefity (Multisport karta, Kafeterie)
Příspěvek na penzijní připojištění nebo dlouhodobý investiční produkt
Stravování v kantýně nebo příspěvek na stravu.
Zvýhodněné volání pro rodinu (tarif: 5 simkaret) + výhodné vedení bankovního účtu
Možnost koupit zaměstnanecké akcie
Notebook, mobilní telefon

Show more
HTML:
Chceš, aby tvoje práce měla dopad? Máš rád/a čísla, ale nechceš být jen „ten člověk s Excel tabulkou“? Přidej se k nám a pojď s námi hledat způsoby, jak dělat věci chytřeji – pomocí dat, spolupráce a inovací.


O čem tahle role je?


  • Budeš pracovat v týmu Commercial, který pomáhá firmě růst chytře – ne jen „víc prodávat“, ale hlavně investovat tam, kde to fakt dává smysl.
  • Budeš analyzovat, co funguje (a co ne), hledat cesty, jak dělat pricing a promoční aktivity efektivněji, a srozumitelně vysvětlovat svoje závěry a doporučení kolegům z obchodu a marketingu.
  • Část práce bude pravidelná (weekly/monthly/quarterly reporty, přehledy), část hodně různorodá (ad-hoc analýzy, práce na projektech zlepšování procesů, implementace nových nástrojů etc).
  • Práce s Excelem a Power BI.


Koho hledáme?


  • Zájem o data a analytické myšlení – hledáme někoho, koho baví objevovat, co se skrývá za čísly.
  • Excel na pokročilé úrovni (min. pivotky, pokročilé funkce, ideálně i makra).
  • Zkušenost s Power BI či obdobným nástrojem je super (ale když nemáš, naučíme tě).
  • Chuť mluvit s lidmi – často budeš zjišťovat, co kolegové potřebují, a pomáhat jim dělat lepší rozhodnutí.
  • Angličtinu na úrovni, kdy zvládneš napsat e-mail nebo odprezentovat jednoduchý výstup i expatům (min B2).
  • A hlavně: otevřený mindset, odvahu zkoušet nové věci a chuť posouvat věci dopředu.


Proč pracovat právě s námi?

  • Práce, která má smysl – uvidíš dopad toho, co děláš, a pomůžeš firmě chytře růst.
  • Možnost růst spolu s námi – naučíš se toho fakt hodně o prodejních procesech, zákaznících i strategii.
  • Fajn tým, kde se nebojíme ptát, sdílet nápady a zkoušet nové věci. Role reportuje RGM manažerovi a komunikuje i s top managementem.
  • Flexibilní prostředí, kde můžeš přicházet s vlastními zlepšováky.
  • Značky, které mají jméno, a firemní kultura, která vám dá prostor zazářit.
  • Osobní i profesní rozvoj – talentové programy, školení a rozvojové aktivity. + e-learning platforma
  • Široká škála benefitů:
  • 5 týdnů dovolené + 2 flexi days
  • Fasování: produkty zdarma (3 balení měsíčně) + zvýhodněný nákup firemních produktů a merche
  • Flexibilní benefity (Multisport karta, Kafeterie)
  • Příspěvek na penzijní připojištění nebo dlouhodobý investiční produkt
  • Stravování v kantýně nebo příspěvek na stravu.
  • Zvýhodněné volání pro rodinu (tarif: 5 simkaret) + výhodné vedení bankovního účtu
  • Možnost koupit zaměstnanecké akcie
  • Notebook, mobilní telefon

Title: Full-Time Position: IT Support Technician – Lisbon Area
Description:
Experienced IT Support Technician – Full-Time – Portugal – Lisbon Area




We’re hiring an experienced Onsite IT Support Technician to join our growing team in Lisbon.

This is a field-based role: you will support customers across Greater Lisbon, working directly at client sites (often on a full-day basis).




Requirements:

Must be based in Lisbon with valid documentation to work in Portugal
Fluent in both Portuguese and English (spoken and written)
Minimum 4–6 years of proven IT support experience (Windows, Office 365, basic networking)
Strong problem-solving skills and confidence dealing with end users in live environments
Must have own transport (travel costs compensated as part of remuneration)




Job Details:

Location: Customer sites across Lisbon area (daily onsite work)
Schedule: Full-time, Monday to Friday
Start Date: Immediate
Type: Long-term contract




How to Apply:

Send your CV and availability to jobs@tsolnetworks.com




-------------🇵🇹-------------




﻿ Técnico de Suporte Informático Experiente – Tempo Inteiro – Portugal – Zona de Lisboa




Estamos a recrutar um Técnico de Suporte Informático Presencial e Experiente para integrar a nossa equipa na zona de Lisboa.

Esta é uma função 100% em cliente: irá apoiar utilizadores diretamente nos locais dos nossos clientes na Grande Lisboa (normalmente em regime de dia completo).




Requisitos:

Residência na zona de Lisboa e documentação válida para trabalhar em Portugal
Domínio escrito e falado de português e inglês
Experiência comprovada mínima de 4–6 anos em suporte técnico (Windows, Office 365, redes básicas)
Forte capacidade de resolução de problemas e comunicação com utilizadores em ambiente de trabalho ativo
Necessário transporte próprio (custos de deslocação compensados na remuneração)




Detalhes da Vaga:

Local: Clientes na região da Grande Lisboa (deslocações diárias)
Horário: Segunda a sexta-feira (tempo inteiro)
Início: Imediato
Tipo: Contrato de longa duração




Candidaturas:

Envie o seu CV e disponibilidade para jobs@tsolnetworks.com

Title: Consulente Service (Accettatore/Accettatrice) - LECCE
Description:
Entra nella nostra squadra!


Opportunità per Consulente Service - LECCE




Il/la Consulente Service è il punto di riferimento tra il cliente del post-vendita e l’officina. Unisce competenze tecniche e spiccate doti relazionali, ascolta le esigenze del cliente e ne assicura la piena soddisfazione, promuovendo anche servizi e prodotti. Garantisce un’esperienza di assistenza efficace, in linea con gli standard di casa madre e di Maldarizzi.




Le attività saranno:





Accogliere il cliente in accettazione e fornire consulenza tecnica in merito agli interventi previsti dal planning.


Gestire l’intero ciclo dell’ordine di lavoro, dall’apertura alla chiusura della commessa, garantendo accuratezza e conformità alle procedure aziendali.


Collaborare con il magazzino per la verifica della disponibilità dei ricambi, informando il cliente sulle tempistiche di intervento.


Predisporre i preventivi, raccogliere le autorizzazioni necessarie e gestire eventuali lavorazioni aggiuntive.


Concludere il servizio con la riconsegna del veicolo, illustrando in modo chiaro le attività svolte e i costi sostenuti.


Curare le comunicazioni telefoniche con professionalità, assicurando un servizio attento e di qualità.


Promuovere e proporre servizi aggiuntivi (come pacchetti di manutenzione, estensioni di garanzia, accessori).


Favorire la soddisfazione e la fidelizzazione del cliente, gestendo in modo efficace anche eventuali reclami.





Cerchiamo te, se





Hai maturato esperienza pregressa nel ruolo di Consulente Service.


Sei in possesso di certificazione specifica per la posizione (titolo preferenziale).


Possiedi conoscenze di base in ambito meccanico ed elettronico, utili alla comprensione degli interventi tecnici.


Sai utilizzare con disinvoltura i principali applicativi informatici e il pacchetto Office.


Comunichi in modo chiaro, efficace e professionale, dimostrando ottime capacità relazionali e dialettiche.


Sei propositivo/a nella relazione con il cliente, promuovendo servizi aggiuntivi e contribuendo a migliorare l’esperienza complessiva.


Dimostri capacità organizzative, di gestione del tempo e delle priorità operative.


Hai voglia di crescere professionalmente e formarti in modo continuativo.





Cosa offriamo





Percorso di inserimento personalizzato.


Formazione continua presso le training Academy di casa madre.


Retribuzione e inquadramento commisurate all’esperienza.


Premi legati al raggiungimento degli obiettivi di KPI.
Show more

Title: Técnico microinformático
Description:
Tareas


Estamos buscando incorporar un/a Técnico de Microinformática con ganas de aprender y progresar. Estamos buscando un perfil medio, con al menos 2/3 años de experiencia y los siguientes conocimientos técnicos:


Requisitos


· Conocimientos técnicos en administración de sistemas operativos Windows (10, 11, Server 2019) y Linux.

· Conocimientos básicos en redes.

· Gestión de Directorio Activo.

· Gestión básica de páginas Web.

· Conocimientos básicos en WordPress.

· Conocimientos básicos en Power BI.

· Hacer reparaciones básicas de hardware.

· Conocimientos básicos de aplicaciones de Microsoft Office.

· Se valora experiencia previa en asistencia a clientes.

· Se valora experiencia previa en Jira y Salesforce.


Beneficios



Contrato indefinido.


Retribución flexible (ticket restaurant, ticket guardería, seguro salud).


Clases de inglés gratis personalizadas con profesora nativa en plantilla.


Club de ahorro con numerosos descuentos en muchos productos y servicios (viajes, tiendas online...).


Formación técnica en plataformas como: Udemy, Openwebinars y Techdone y posibilidad de certificarse.





En CIVIR, valoramos la diversidad y facilitamos la inserción de personas con discapacidad, priorizando su candidatura. ¡No dudes en aplicar a nuestras ofertas!

Title: Analista de Operações Júnior
HTML:
Profissional de apoio técnico-administrativo com atuação nas áreas de tratamento, controle de qualidade e operação de sistemas de água e esgoto. Responsável por executar atividades padronizadas com aplicação de técnicas básicas, auxiliar no monitoramento e melhoria de processos, apoiar estudos e diagnósticos operacionais e contribuir para o cumprimento das normas de qualidade, meio ambiente e segurança. Atua de forma colaborativa no planejamento, execução e controle das atividades, garantindo a eficiência operacional e a conformidade com os procedimentos internos.

Desenvolver atividades com orientações frequentes e desempenhar tarefas padronizadas;

Apoiar na análise dos processos de tratamento e controle de qualidade de água e afluentes, monitorando todas as etapas (captação, tratamento, distribuição e coleta);

Auxiliar na identificação de melhorias para utilização de recursos, operação, manutenção e controle dos sistemas;

Apoiar na realização de estudos, diagnósticos e revisão do fluxo de atividades;

Apoiar atividades relacionadas à operação, conservação e manutenção de sistemas de produção, controle de qualidade, abastecimento de água, coleta e disposição final de esgotos;

Apoiar na análise de instalação, manutenção, remanejamento e prolongamento de redes de água e esgoto;

Apoiar no levantamento e medição de impactos inerentes à implantação e operação de estações elevatórias e estações de tratamento;

Apoiar na criação e estabelecimento de padrões para metodologias analíticas laboratoriais de água, esgoto e procedimentos de coleta;

Title: ADDETTI/E ASSISTENZA TELEFONICA JUNIOR h24_PARMA
Description:
Etjca S.p.a.

Etjca S.p.A., agenzia per il lavoro (Aut. Min. Prot. N. 1309-SG del 23/02/2005), filiale di Parma, ricerca e seleziona per azienda cliente, n.5 ADDETTI/E AL CUSTOMER SERVICE.

MANSIONE

Le risorse inserite dovranno occuparsi, su turnazione h24 da lunedì a domenica con riposo a scorrimento, di:


Gestione delle telefonate in entrata da parte dei clienti
Risoluzione delle problematiche
Inserimento dati e aggiornamenti sul gestionale
Report per team leader

Esperienza in lavori a contatto col pubblico
Buona dialettica
Diploma o laurea
Ottimo uso del pc
Disponibilità immediata
Domicilio in zona
Disponibilità immediata

CCNL Commercio Terziario 5°livello
Lavoro a giornata da lunedì a domenica su 3 turni (previsto anche il turno notturno)


LUOGO DI LAVORO


Parma

LUOGO DI LAVORO

  • Parma

L'offerta è rivolta a candidati ambosessi nel rispetto del D.lgs 198/2006 e ss.mm.ii. e dei Decreti legislativi n. 215 e 216 del 2003 sulla parità di trattamento. Si invitano i candidati a prendere visione dell'informativa privacy https://etjca.it/informativa-per-candidati (art.13 e 14, Reg EU 679/2016) pubblicata sul sito www.etjca.it.

Etjca S.p.A. (Aut. Min. Prot. N. 1309-SG del 23/02/2005)

Settore: Telemarketing/Call center

Ruolo: Customer Service

Percentuale di occupazione: Full-time

Disponibilità lavorativa: Lavoro su turni

Gestisce altre persone: No

Tipo di occupazione: Lavoro temporaneo a scopo assunzione

Livello di istruzione: Diploma di Scuola Secondaria Superiore

Title: Administrativo/a (M/F) - Braga
HTML:
Empresa

Inserida no Grupo Serlima, a Serlima Target é a área de negócio cuja especialização é focada em soluções de trabalho temporário e Cedências Diretas, funcionando tanto como suporte das operações como das restantes empresas do Grupo. Sob o lema “Facultamos o profissional certo!” estamos a recrutar um Administrativo/a (M/F) para empresa cliente na zona de Braga.

Descrição

  • Elaboração de mapas; - Gestão de stock; - Realização de inventários; - Colaborar na garantia do seguimento eficaz do processo de faturação; - Gestão das compras;

Requisitos

  • Experiência mínima de 2 anos na área administrativa; - Escolaridade mínima obrigatória: 12.º ano; - Carta de condução + viatura própria; - Disponibilidade imediata;

Oferta

  • Pacote salarial congruente com a experiência demonstrada; - Formação inicial e continua; - Contrato direto com empresa cliente;

Title: Business Analyst Data & Architecture (H/F)
Place: Nantes, Pays de la Loire, France
Description:
Rejoignez une entreprise familiale avec plus de 50 ans d’histoire et d’expertise dédiée au monde agricole. Fondé en 1972, le Groupe SAVAS se distingue par sa fidélité, son professionnalisme, et son service au quotidien auprès de ses clients et partenaires.

Avec 10 sites et une équipe de 140 personnes, nous anticipons les évolutions du secteur tout en restant engagés envers nos valeurs et nos collaborateurs.

Vos missions :

En tant que Data & Performance Analyst Manager, vous pilotez la transformation digitale et managez l'équipe Digital & Data

Architecture & Gouvernance Data :


Concevoir et maintenir l'architecture globale des données de l'entreprise
Cartographier les flux entre ERP, CRM et outils métiers sur nos 10 sites
Administrer notre plateforme Microsoft Azure (Data Factory, Data Studio)
Assurer la gouvernance, qualité et sécurité des données du groupe


Analyse Business & Performance :


Recueillir et analyser les besoins des directions métiers (Commerce, RH, Marketing)
Traduire les demandes métiers en spécifications fonctionnelles et techniques
Créer les tableaux de bord stratégiques pour la direction
Développer les analyses de performance et KPI métiers sectoriels


Pilotage de Projets Digitaux :


Cadrer et piloter les projets de transformation digitale multi-sites
Superviser le déploiement du CRM et son intégration à l'écosystème
Coordonner les équipes internes et prestataires externes (Koesio)
Mesurer l'impact des projets sur la performance opérationnelle


Management & Coordination Équipe :


Manager le Junior Revenue Ops et coordonner avec le Technicien IT
Développer les compétences de l'équipe sur les outils data et CRM
Servir d'interface entre les équipes métiers et techniques
Animer les comités de pilotage des projets digitaux


Compétences Techniques Requise :


Business Analysis : Méthodes d'analyse métier, modélisation processus, cahiers des charges
Data Architecture : Modélisation de données, flux ETL, gouvernance data
Power BI avancé : Création de dashboards complexes, DAX, modélisation
SQL : Requêtes avancées et manipulation de données relationnelles
Azure : Data Factory, Data Studio (notions ou forte motivation d'apprentissage)
CRM/ERP : Connaissance des systèmes de gestion et problématiques d'intégratio


Votre Profil :


Formation : Master (Bac+5) École d'Ingénieur ou équivalent
Expérience : 4-8 ans en analyse business avec dimension data/architecture
Secteur : Connaissance des ERP métiers et problématiques d'intégration appréciée
Personnalité : Leadership, sens du relationnel, esprit d'équipe, vision business et pédagogie


Poste basé sur une des agences du Groupe Saumur (49), Cholet (49), Ancenis (44), Chateauroux (36)

Le Groupe SAVAS valorise toutes les candidatures, quels que soient le parcours, l’expérience ou le profil des candidats. Nous croyons fermement que chaque personne peut apporter une contribution unique à notre équipe.
Show more

Title: Junior IT-Support (1st Level Support) (m/w/d)
Description:
Für dich sind IPv4, DHCP oder DNS keine wild aneinander gereihten Buchstabenfolgen und du hilfst Kunden gerne telefonisch oder per Mail bei ihren IT Problemen, dann sollten wir sprechen.




Wir bei ristl IT haben mit unseren B2B IT-Dienstleistungen den vollen Fokus auf Managed Services, Cloud & Security im Microsoft Umfeld. Dabei arbeiten wir mit einem Flatrate Modell, das sicherstellt, dass jedes Ticket in Ruhe zu Ende gearbeitet werden kann und wir für dich das ideale Lernumfeld schaffen.




Hast du Lust mit uns als IT- und Netzwerk-Techniker in unserem Büro in Wien (1010) richtig durchzustarten?


Aufgaben



Du kümmerst dich um Windows-Kundennetzwerke von 5 bis 250 Computerarbeitsplätzen


Es macht dir Spaß, am Telefon, per E-Mail, via Ticketsystem, per Fernwartung oder vor Ort Supportanfragen zu bearbeiten


Nachhaltige und umfassende Betreuung von Kunden durch unser Flatrate Modell


Du hast den Überblick über alle relevanten Kundensysteme und IT-Services


Die Administration und Konfiguration von Windows Server Landschaften, Microsoft 365 sowie Azure Umgebungen



Qualifikation



Du hast eine abgeschlossene IT-Ausbildung und/oder erste Berufserfahrung im IT-Support


Im Kontakt mit Kunden konntest du in der Vergangenheit immer punkten


Am Telefon, per E-Mail, via Ticketsystem, per Fernwartung oder vor Ort bist du immer freundlich und bewahrst einen ruhigen Kopf


Du verfügst über ausgezeichnete Deutschkenntnisse (C2) in Wort und Schrift


Windows Server inklusive dazugehöriger Rollen (AD, File-Server, DNS, DHCP, etc.) hast du schon mal mit betreut


Microsoft Cloud-Lösungen (Microsoft/Office 365, Intune, Azure, etc.) sind für dich mehr als nur Luftschlösser


Netzwerke wie IPv4, IPv6, Routing/Switching, vLAN, WLAN, ISO/OSI, etc. sind keine Hieroglyphen für dich


PowerShell, RMM, PSA Tools und Linux Know-how helfen dir, sind aber nicht zwingend notwendig



Benefits



Veraltete Softwarestacks oder festgefahrenen Strukturen wirst du bei uns nicht finden


Bei uns kannst du durch unser Flatrate Abrechnungs-Modell Tickets in Ruhe und nachhaltig zu Ende arbeiten, bei Herausforderungen unterstützen wir dich gerne


Auf dich wartet ein motiviertes und kollegiales Team, das in jeder Situation zusammenhält


Wir stehen nicht auf festgefahrene Strukturen und Altlasten, sondern challengen uns immer wieder aufs Neue


In unserem zentralen Büro in Wien erwarten dich zum Start dein Firmenlaptop (Windows) & Firmenhandy (iPhone)


Wenn du mit den Öffis kommst, bezuschussen wir gern dein KlimaTicket





Und jetzt fragst du dich sicher noch: Was kannst du bei uns verdienen?




Wir bieten dir ein Gehalt zwischen 35.000 EUR und 45.000 EUR (brutto) pro Jahr auf Vollzeitbasis je nach Berufserfahrung und Qualifikation.




"Konnten wir dein Interesse wecken?" würden jetzt die meisten fragen. Aber ganz ehrlich: Wenn du tatsächlich alles bis hier gelesen hast, sollten wir uns kennenlernen.




Was denkst du?




Viele Grüße




Christian

Show more
